name: D or D
description:
D or D is a psychological horror game that immerses you in daily experiences.Xiaoshan's school suddenly received a transfer student. As time passed, Xiaoshan's relationship with the transfer student deepened and some memories from the past gradually surfaced in their minds.

features:
You can experience the ordinary daily life of a high school student Xiaoshan.

You control a high school student who needs to wake up early for school day day, and click on objects or characters to advance the storyline.

Original art and soundtrack brimming with personality.
